page.title: 12Kerrison School
page.content: Kerrison School is run by Mr Welsh and the principal is Mr George.30 teenagers attend the school.The age range is 13 to 17 years old. There used to be a farm that the teenagers used to work on but now the farm is sold. The school goes on a lot of outings to the theatre and Portman Road. They have walked 50 miles around the coast. For their transport they have two minibuses and one car, on average they all do 25000 miles a year. The first person to attend the school was James Cooper who came on the 2nd April 1856, he was sent to Bury St Edmunds for 14 days in prison. The second member- Frederick stole two rabbits and he spent one month in prison and was whipped. They have lots of sports equipment and a swimming pool.
